title: Remove 'undefined' altogether from JavaScript
body: Only keep 'null'. The use of a "strict mode level 2" might be necessary.

comments.body:
I disagree.
If this is ever done, lots of webapps won't work anymore. Haven't had much complication with it.
I disagree.  There is a very distinct difference between whether a variable (think member of an object/map) is null or undefined.
